author: Caroline Barghout,Kristin Annable
title: Medical experts warn against claims by Winnipeg acupuncturist advertising 'coronavirus prevention tea'
description: Medical experts are warning Canadians not to believe the hype after a hidden camera investigation revealed a Winnipeg acupuncturist was selling an herbal tea that purports to prevent COVID-19.
content:
Medical experts are warning Canadians not to believe the hype, after a hidden camera investigation revealed a Winnipeg acupuncturist was selling an herbal tea that he claims can prevent COVID-19. 
In an email blast to clients last week, Guojian Huang, an acu… [+8787 chars]
